rawData.description: Are you a new Notion user and Notion feels overwhelming to you? My Life Planner is perfect for you. Improve your productivity and organized life with this Life Planner. This Notion template can help you track everything. What you'll get into this Notion Life Planner.This is divided into 4 aspects of your life. Personal Professional Entertainment Self-care Professional lifeSocial media planner: Presenting the simplest social media planner to plan and manage your social media in one place.Finance Tracker: if you are spending too much or do not know how to balance your finances this is for you.Client work: are you a freelancer and dont have a system in place my life planner has all.Meeting manager: manage all your client meetings in a simple calendar.Personal life:Daily Planner: Manage your daily to-do list and tasks in an easy-to-use daily planner.Habit tracker: a simple weekly habit tracker for your habits.Goals tracker: a simple checkbox goals tracker for beginner notion users.Bucket list: make your bucket list and explore new opportunities in your life.Self-careSkincare: have a skincare routine, it‚Äôs time to track it.Yoga: Make your day worth it by tracking your meditation.Me time: spend some time with yourself and track it on the Notion.Journal: daily journal to keep and track your emotional health.Why this Life Planner: Specially made for beginners: Are you a new user of notion, I was too when I made this template. If the notion feels overwhelming to you this Notion template is for you. Cover all areas of life: this template covers all the things you need in your life from emotions health to music, everything in one dashboard. Aesthetic and customizable: the template has pleasing aesthetics and is fully customizable. What is so special about this planner? By using this planner, you can track your: Daily goals Weekly goals Monthly goals You'll also get the following: Habit tracker Money tracker Drama watchlist Skincare routine You can catch your thoughts with the daily journal and day highlights. So get ready to make 2023 your year with clear goal-setting and good habits. FAQs Who am I? I‚Äôm Poonam Sharma, a freelance writer & content creator. I like to simplify people's lives with my Notion Templates and content. How to use this notion template?You have to Click ‚Äúduplicate‚Äù in the top right corner to duplicate the template to your Notion workspace, and you got this.Is it a free product? Yes, it's a completely free product. But if you want to give a tip for my time and effort, you can pay a small amount. You can pay any amount if you like the template. Still have questions!Reach out to me by email at poonam4dhahariya@gmail.com or drop a message on my LinkedIn. Feel free to give your suggestion about this template as well by email. Thanks, Poonam Sharma
features: Specially made for beginners: Are you a new user of notion, I was too when I made this template. If the notion feels overwhelming to you this Notion template is for you.
Cover all areas of life: this template covers all the things you need in your life from emotions health to music, everything in one dashboard.
Aesthetic and customizable: the template has pleasing aesthetics and is fully customizable.

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive life organization dashboard designed specifically for Notion beginners who feel overwhelmed by complex productivity systems. This all-in-one template consolidates personal, professional, entertainment, and self-care management into a single, beginner-friendly interface that helps users develop productive habits across all life areas.
problemsSolved: Notion interface feels too complex and overwhelming for new users
Scattered productivity tools across multiple apps and platforms
Difficulty maintaining consistent habits and tracking progress across life areas
Lack of integrated system for managing both personal and professional responsibilities
Struggling to balance and monitor finances, wellness, and entertainment activities
solutionsBenefits: Simplified, beginner-friendly interface that reduces Notion learning curve
Unified dashboard consolidating all life management aspects in one location
Structured tracking systems that promote habit formation and goal achievement
Aesthetically pleasing design that encourages consistent daily use
Fully customizable framework that adapts to individual lifestyle needs
idealFor: Notion beginners seeking their first comprehensive organization system
Freelancers needing integrated client and personal life management
Individuals wanting to develop better habits across multiple life areas
People looking to consolidate scattered productivity tools into one platform
Users who prefer simple, aesthetically pleasing organization interfaces
notRecommendedFor: Advanced Notion users who need complex database relationships
Teams requiring collaborative features and multi-user access
Users focused solely on business management without personal life integration
People who prefer specialized single-purpose productivity applications
whatsIncluded: Four-section life dashboard (Personal, Professional, Entertainment, Self-care)
Daily, weekly, and monthly goal tracking systems
Habit tracker with weekly progress monitoring
Financial expense and budget management tools
Client work and meeting management system
Wellness tracking for skincare, yoga, and meditation
Entertainment watchlist and bucket list organizers

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can modify sections, add your own categories, change colors and layouts, and adapt the structure to match your specific lifestyle needs.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with free Notion accounts and doesn't require AI features. It's designed using basic Notion functionality to remain accessible for all users.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Setup is extremely simple - just duplicate the template to your workspace and start filling in your information. The beginner-friendly design means no technical configuration required.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The template structure is timeless and works for any year. You can easily update date ranges and calendar views for current use, and the creator provides ongoing support for updates.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The creator offers email support and LinkedIn messaging for questions. The template also includes built-in guidance and is specifically designed to be intuitive for beginners.
